work.name: GIS Center, Research Center for Humanities and Social Sciences, Academia Sinica

publications.name: Application of Deep Learning for Symbol Detection on Historical Maps to Explore Spatiotemporal Changes in the Regional Tea Industry of Early 20th-Century Taiwan
publications.publisher: Pi-Ling Pai, Chen-Yu Liu, Chiao-Ling Kuo, Ta-Chien Chan
publications.summary: Designed and implemented a deep learning pipeline using YOLOv8 to detect symbols (e.g., fields, forests, tea gardens) on historical maps, achieving mAP50-95 of 0.78.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
